projects.name: Chat-App
projects.description: Empower users to connect, share, and collaborate seamlessly through real-time communication in a modern chat application. Implemented user authentication and authorization features using JWT for secure access control. Utilized React.js to create a responsive and interactive user interface for seamless user experience.

projects.name: CrowdNav
projects.description: Spearheaded a four-person team to develop an ML integrated web app. The app aims to enhance the travelling experience of the commuters. Powered with an ML model which is capable of telling the exact no. of available vacant seats in a bus at any point of time during its commute. Locates all the nearby available buses from a person on the UI, with the help of GPS access of the person and the bus.

experiences.description: Collaborated with a three-person team to develop a web app TOURS SIMPLIFIED which is capable of locating all the hotels, restaurants and tourist places near a person. Powered by geolocation access of the user, the app uses Rapid API to fetch the required data near the geolocation. The app reflects all the available hotels, restaurants and tourist attractions near the person and that too based upon the filtered star rating of the venue.

full_output.name: Siddharth Upadhyay
achievements_and_awards: AWS Academy Graduate - AWS Academy Cloud Architecting
